short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Neebify automates LinkedIn outreach, data extraction, and campaign management, boosting productivity and lead generation success.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn LinkedIn into Your Best Lead Source with Neebify - Easy Prospecting, Simplified

Neebify’s extension lets you quickly import LinkedIn leads and start campaigns with just a few clicks – no tech expertise needed!

🔁 Save Time with Automation
Grab profiles from LinkedIn, Sales Navigator, and Recruiter Lite, set up your campaigns, and let Neebify do the heavy lifting. Spend more time closing deals, not chasing leads.

🕵️ Perfect for Busy Pros
Whether you’re in sales, marketing, recruiting, or freelancing, Neebify makes expanding your network simple and boosts your outreach.

⛽ Speed Up Prospecting
Use proven message templates to fuel your lead gen efforts and keep campaigns running smoothly, even offline.

📧 Built-In Email Finder
Capture the details that matter and sync seamlessly with your CRM for easy follow-up.

📩 All-in-One Inbox
Keep LinkedIn conversations organized, schedule messages, and stay on top of your leads.

🆓 Try It Free
Enjoy a 7-day free trial to see how Neebify can help – no credit card required.
